mapper.delete: DELETE FROM serviceCatalogToDept WHERE catalogId = #{catalogId} AND sourceId = #{sourceId}
mapper.select: SELECT C.catalogId,C.catalogName,C.description,C.parentId,C.status,C.defaultQueueId,B.FHumanName as humanName,C.icon FROM serviceCatalogToDept A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.sourceId=B.FUserId LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog C ON A.catalogId=C.catalogId WHERE A.type=1 and B.FUserName= #{userId} UNION SELECT D.catalogId,D.catalogName,D.description,D.parentId,D.status,D.defaultQueueId,C.FHumanName as humanName,D.icon FROM serviceCatalogToDept A LEFT JOIN tsysdept B ON A.sourceId=B.FDeptId LEFT JOIN tsysuser C ON B.FSourceCode=C.FDeptId LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog D ON A.catalogId=D.catalogId WHERE A.type=0 and C.FUserName= #{userId}

SELECT D.catalogId,D.catalogName,D.shortName,D.icon,D.status FROM serviceCatalogToDept A LEFT JOIN tsysuser B ON A.sourceId=B.FUserId LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog C ON A.catalogId=C.catalogId LEFT JOIN serviceCatalog D ON D.catalogId=C.parentId WHERE A.type=1 and B.FUserName= #{userId} UNION SELECT E.catalogId,E.catalogName,E.shortName,E.icon,E.status FROM serviceCatalogToDept A LEFT JOIN tsysdept B ON A.sourceId=B.FDeptId LEFT JOIN tsysuser C ON B.FSourceCode=C.FDeptId LEFT JOIN subServiceCatalog D ON A.catalogId=D.catalogId LEFT JOIN serviceCatalog E ON E.catalogId=D.parentId WHERE A.type=0 and C.FUserName= #{userId}

SELECT t1.FUserId as userId,t1.FUserName as userName,t1.FHumanName as humanName, t2.FDeptId as deptId,t2.FDeptName as deptName , 1 as flag FROM tsysuser t1 LEFT JOIN tsysdept t2 ON t1.FDeptId = t2.FSourceCode WHERE ( CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM serviceCatalogToDept t3 WHERE t3.type=1 AND t3.sourceId=t1.FUserId AND t3.catalogId =#{catalogId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) = 1
AND ( t1.FHumanName like concat('%',#{name},'%') OR t1.FUserName like concat('%',#{name},'%') )
SELECT count(0) as a FROM tsysdept t2 WHERE t2.FParentId in (SELECT t1.FOrgSourceId FROM tsysorgas t1 WHERE t1.FOrgId = #{orgId} ) AND t2.FFlag = 0
SELECT t2.FDeptId FROM tsysdept t2 WHERE t2.FParentId in (SELECT t1.FOrgSourceId FROM tsysorgas t1 WHERE t1.FOrgId = #{orgId} ) AND t2.FFlag = 0
SELECT count(0) as a FROM tsysdept t2 WHERE t2.FParentId in (SELECT t1.FSourceCode FROM tsysdept t1 WHERE t1.FDeptId = #{deptId} ) AND t2.FFlag = 0
SELECT t2.FDeptId FROM tsysdept t2 WHERE t2.FParentId in (SELECT t1.FSourceCode FROM tsysdept t1 WHERE t1.FDeptId = #{deptId} ) AND t2.FFlag = 0

SELECT t1.FUserId as userId,t1.FUserName as userName,t1.FHumanName as humanName, t2.FDeptId as deptId,t2.FDeptName as deptName , ( CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM serviceCatalogToDept t3 WHERE t3.type=1 AND t3.sourceId=t1.FUserId AND t3.catalogId = #{catalogId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as flag FROM tsysuser t1 LEFT JOIN tsysdept t2 ON t1.FDeptId = t2.FSourceCode WHERE t2.FDeptId =#{deptId}
AND ( t1.FHumanName like concat('%',#{name},'%') OR t1.FUserName like concat('%',#{name},'%') )
SELECT * FROM serviceCatalogToDept WHERE catalogId = #{catalogId} and type = 1
SELECT count(*) as a FROM serviceCatalogToDept WHERE catalogId = #{catalogId} and sourceId = #{sourceId} and type = 1
